EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-02-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Tampa-Bay.ES-2017-11-22-Tampa-5.EM-2017-1
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Thanksgiving from our family to yours
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
Whether your a customer today or considering to join the Turbonomic family, I'd like to personally thank you for being a part of our community. At Turbonomic, our community is the core to our organization driving our mission to help customers manage any workload, on any infrastructure, anywhere and at any time. We couldn't be more grateful for our customers who's voices drive our product roadmap and motivate our team to deliver the only Hybrid Cloud Management Platform that assures application performance in real-time.
In case you missed it, I wanted to share with you that will be hosting an exclusive event in your local Tampa Bay area - the Tampa Bay Executive Networking Game <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay/]]> on Saturday, December 2nd 2017 at the home of the Lightning, the Amalie Arena at 6:30PM.
I hope you can make it. As space is limited, I do ask that you please register here <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay/]]> as soon as possible.
Yours sincerely, Dave
<[[https://turbonomic.com/learn-phoenix]]>
Dave Kranowitz Vice President, North America Turbonomic, Inc.
